intro.title: Hello, I'm Lain
intro.desc:
Robot development enthusiast, Junior Year Student.
Interning at a Humanoid Robot Company.
Focus on MCU & Linux development, Motion Control, RL, and Perception.
Email: lain-ego@qq.com

item1.title: ROBOCON Quadruped Robot Full-Stack
item1.desc: 2025 Season. Carbon tube assembly mechanism + Force control algorithm + 3D LiDAR mapping & navigation.

item2.title: Bionic Boston Lobster Submersible
item2.desc: Lower computer framework integrating stepper pumps, motor drives, gyro processing, and IIC encoder closed-loop control.

item3.title: Intelligent Agriculture Robot
item3.desc: Based on FreeRTOS. Controlled DJI3508 motors for gripper lifting, omni-wheel chassis, and positioning system.

item1.title: BRS Parallel Quadruped Robot
item1.desc: Open-source parallel structure quadruped robot project, exploring efficient mechanical structure and control implementation.

item2.title: SliverWolf Desktop Quadruped
item2.desc: Direct-drive serial quadruped using 9g servos, featuring IMU control, voice control, and robotic arm collaboration.

item3.title: Quadruped Robot Knowledge Base
item3.desc: A comprehensive R&D knowledge base covering mechanics, electronic control, and algorithms.

event1.title: Open Source SliverWolf
event1.desc: Released SliverWolf, a desktop quadruped robot with voice control and arm collaboration capabilities.

event2.title: Agri-Robot Development
event2.desc: Developed embedded control system based on FreeRTOS, achieving ±5mm positioning accuracy.

event3.title: Intelligent Marine Equip. Comp.
event3.desc: Won the Special Prize in the Underwater Robot Track (Fujian Province).

event4.title: 2024 World Maritime Equip. Conf.
event4.desc: Exhibited the Bionic Lobster Robot representing FJUT; reported by Xinhua News Agency.

event5.title: 2025 ROBOCON National
event5.desc: Won 2nd Prize in Speed, Obstacle, and Cross-country races. Responsible for full-stack development.

event6.title: Open Source BRS Robot
event6.desc: Open-sourced the mechanical structure and control code for the BRS parallel quadruped robot on GitHub.
